samples.name: Default Functionalities
samples.description: The example explains the default functionalities of the Vue splitter with resizable panes, separator, and orientation (horizontal and vertical).

samples.name: Expand and Collapse
samples.description: The example presents collapsible Splitter Component that exposes expand and collapse action of panes with a different orientation and resizable panes.

samples.name: Accordion Navigation Menu
samples.description: The example shows how to integrate Accordion and load the content from external sources using the Ajax library inside panes of Vue Splitter.

samples.name: Details View
samples.description: The example demonstrates how to create employee details view layout using panes of Vue Splitter and ListView with navigation.

samples.name: Outlook-style Layout
samples.description: The example explains how to construct an outlook style layout using Vue Splitter, TreeView, ListView, and Rich Text Editor with multiple panes.

samples.name: Code Editor Layout
samples.description: The example shows how to construct code editor layout (UI) using Vue Splitter with multiple, nested, different oriented, and resizable panes.
